array.name: violation_1
array.item: Construction not built according to code

array.item: Operation of an unapproved food premises

array.item: Operation has an invalid food permit

array.item: Permit not posed clearly

array.name: violation_5
array.item: Food contamination found

array.name: violation_6
array.item: Food processing unfit for consumption

array.name: violation_7
array.item: Food not cooled in an acceptable manner

array.name: violation_8
array.item: Food not cooked/heated in a safe way

array.name: violation_9
array.item: Cold food stored/displayed above 4 °C

array.name: violation_10
array.item: Hot food stored/displayed below 60 °C

array.name: violation_11
array.item: Foods obtained from unapproved sources

array.name: violation_12
array.item: Food not protected from contamination

array.name: violation_13
array.item: Food not thawed in an acceptable manner

array.name: violation_14
array.item: Frozen food stored/displayed above -18 °C

array.name: violation_15
array.item: No acceptable written food handling procedures

array.name: violation_16
array.item: Contact surfaces are not hygienic

array.name: violation_17
array.item: Contact surfaces not properly washed

array.name: violation_18
array.item: Sanitary hot & cold water equip. inadequate

array.name: violation_19
array.item: Premises not free of pests

array.name: violation_20
array.item: Conditions may allow pests growth

array.name: violation_21
array.item: Food premises does not remain hygienic

array.name: violation_22
array.item: Contact surfaces not of suitable material

array.name: violation_23
array.item: Contact surfaces not in working order

array.name: violation_24
array.item: Cleaning agents improperly labeled

array.name: violation_25
array.item: Throwaway equip. used more than once

array.name: violation_26
array.item: Premises not maintained as per approved plans

array.name: violation_27
array.item: Non-equip. items being stored on the premises

array.name: violation_28
array.item: Live animal on premise (not guide animal)

array.name: violation_29
array.item: No acceptable written sanitation procedures

array.name: violation_30
array.item: Fridges and hot-hold equip. has bad thermometers

array.name: violation_31
array.item: Adequate wash basins unavailable

array.name: violation_32
array.item: Employees does not wash hands accordingly

array.name: violation_33
array.item: Bad personal hygiene and hair control

array.name: violation_34
array.item: Employee smoking in food prep. areas

array.name: violation_35
array.item: Operator has no FOODSAFE L1 or similar

array.name: violation_36
array.item: No one other than operator has FOODSAFE L1
